features: 【100% Leak-Proof Lid】Soufull Tumbler adopts newly upgraded 3in1 MagSlider lid and double-threaded twisting design, keeps the cup completely sealed and sweat proof. It is easy to handle the shakes and bumps of sports or car travel, enjoy the joy of drinking to your heart's content!

【Double Wall Vacuum Insulation】Soufull 40 oz tumbler made with double wall vacuum insulation and 304 stainless steel, which keeps beverages cold for up to 34 hours and hot for up to 10 hours. It means the insulated tumbler cup keeps your favorite drinks ice cold or piping hot for hours. Let you enjoy hot and iced drinks until the last sip.

【Portable Super Capacity Travel Cup】 This large tumbler can be safely placed in most car cup holders, no worries when traveling far. Tumbler also has a humanized design silicone sleeve straw and handle, easy to drink directly or through a straw, on-the-go hydration!

【Dishwasher Safe, BPA Free】Electro-Polished interior will ensure bottle remain pure, high-quality and durable material makes bottle dishwasher safe, freeing your hands! Bottle is BPA free and odor free, great for any beer, water, soda, milk, iced coffee, tea, mixed drinks, or even a smoothie, any drink you want.

【100% Customer Satisfaction】The high quality modern design of insulated travel mug makes it a must have accessories for each family, which is very suitable for outdoor gatherings or comfortable nights at home. If the Soufull products had any quality problem, Please contact us without hesitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Functional: A Review of the 40 oz Tumbler with Handle and Straw Lid in PinkBlue
reviews.reviewText: The 40 oz Tumbler with Handle and Straw Lid has quickly become my go-to travel companion for both hot and cold beverages. From the moment I received it, I was impressed by its sleek design and vibrant PinkBlue color, which adds a touch of style to my daily routine.One of the standout features of this tumbler is its exceptional insulation capabilities. Whether I'm sipping on a hot coffee during my morning commute or enjoying a refreshing cold beverage at the gym, this tumbler maintains the temperature remarkably well. I've been amazed by its ability to keep my drinks cold for up to 34 hours and hot for 10 hours, exceeding my expectations every time.The leak-proof design is another highlight of this travel mug. I've tested it in various situations, from bumpy car rides to rigorous workouts, and it has never let me down. The straw lid ensures easy access to my beverages while preventing any spills or leaks, making it perfect for on-the-go use.Additionally, the dishwasher-safe feature makes cleaning a breeze, allowing for effortless maintenance and convenience. The sturdy handle provides a comfortable grip, enhancing the overall user experience.Overall, the 40 oz Tumbler with Handle and Straw Lid has surpassed my expectations in terms of performance, durability, and design. Whether you're a coffee lover, tea enthusiast, or simply looking for a reliable travel mug, I highly recommend this product for its outstanding quality and functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and FITS IN CUP HOLDERS!
reviews.reviewText: Not only is this tumbler really pretty, it holds a ton of water and keeps it cold for many hours. It’s very sturdy and easy to use and clean. I like that metal straws were also included. I bring iteverywhere I go, love that it also fits in the cup holder in my car!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and keeping my drinks cold
reviews.reviewText: I love this water cup. I have only used for cold (water). Love the color variety and that is fits in my cup holder. I just wish it took a wider straw.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and good quality
reviews.reviewText: My kid (16) smiled when she opened this as a Christmas gift and uses it all the time. The lid seals well, the straw has a silicone tip so you don’t bang your teeth, and it keeps her water cold. It’s a pretty color and looks cool. So, it’s a win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Insulation, but can be pretty heavy
reviews.reviewText: We bought the 40z cup in pink and blue for my mom. She’s a driver and her job usually requires her to be on the go all day in vehicles without air conditioning. This cup has worked great so far for her. First of all, she loves the color. We got it in pink, but we made the mistake of dishwashing it, so it’s lost a little bit of it’s color, but still is pretty vibrant, nonetheless. I’d definitely recommend gently hand washing. It’s a perfect size. It fits sung in not only her car cup holder, but in the cupholder on her bus. Best of all, the insulation works great. It keeps her water cold for the entirety of a 6-8 hour work day, even when it’s warm. It hasn’t leaked or spilled so far. She also loves that it comes with a straw, which is perfect for water, and a spout, which is perfect for iced coffee and tea.The only minor downside is the weight of the cup, which is to be expected, given that it’s 40 oz. and made of stainless steal. However, the handle on the side helps a great deal with this problem. The lid can also be pretty difficult to twist off sometimes, if you tighten it too much. We’ve learned how to easily get it to come off though, by running the lid under warm water.Overall, the cup is a great value and is quite effective for its affordable price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shady Customer Service??
reviews.reviewText: Edit: Soon after I bought this mug, I received a postcard in the mail offering me a $20 gift card if I wrote a review for this product, and email them my transaction number. I had already reviewed this mug, and followed the instructions. Two months later and I've never received the promised gift card, nor any further communication from them. Is this even legal? Feels pretty scammy to me.-Also, one of the lids randomly had the slider break. I would buy a replacement lid if I knew where to find one.-------------------------------------I bought one for my myself, green and pink, and then my husband wanted one for work, so we got him the blue and white. His ice lasted all day in 98⁰+ heat. He closes the lid, but I use a straw. I'm home all day, and it's great to have ice cold lemon water any time of the day or night. My ice lasted 16 hours, even with the lid opened for the straw. We stopped buying bottled water, so I started drinking from a crystal goblet, which made my water nice and cold. The problem was that I had to refill it so many times in a day. I kept running out of ice, too. This mug is just the size that's convenient for me. Now, when I wake up in the middle of the night and want a sip of water, it's cold and refreshing.I don't think the ice will last as long as they say, but it lasts a lot longer than any similar mugs or thermoses I've ever owned. It's leak-proof when the lid is closed. It holds a lot of liquid and ice. It's so easy to clean! It goes right into the dishwasher, which is great! The big surprise came when I hand-washed it as soon as it arrived. I was able to get my hand all the way in, to the very bottom, to clean it! It even fits perfectly into the cup holder if our car. The lid is easy to remove with the extra lip for leverage. I also like that the lid is clear, so I know exactly what's in the mug. I am so happy with this purchase. If you're interested in getting one, do it. For this price, you can't go wrong. All the other ones this size cost more, and don't have all the great features. Stay hydrated, friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this and just as good as a Stanley
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to not spend so much money on a Stanley cup and also didn’t want the built in strawberry because I use this for hot and cold. The trawlers that come with it are amazing - stainless for hot and plastic for cold - I use silicone straws for both and when moving in the car I can just close the lid on the straw so there are no leaks.This mug is half the price of a Stanley and prettier.it keeps my water cold all day long and my coffee hot for hours. I find that the lid closes so tight I can close the opening and turn it upside down and nothing comes out! I love this cup and I only say it’s a bit heavy, and it takes a little maneuvering to close the lid so the straw allows for right- handed usage. But once you figure it out it’s minor. I fully recommend this cup!
